metadata.synopsis: When players put items or gold in the chest in Stormshore Tabernacle, this AD will be played: gods didn't like that someone touch their sacred chests.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Add items or gold into S_LOW_TyrChest, S_LOW_SeluneChest, S_LOW_MystraChest, S_LOW_HelmChest, S_LOW_GenericGodChest

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Best not to touch the chest of offerings other mortals have left to their gods. But I can use the altar to pray.
